name: Brandon Ferrell
bio: Brandon is a senior studying Software Engineering with a domain of AI. He has experience presenting to the youth, and he brings this background to the AIS in order to present AI in an interactive manner to students. Brandon has full-stack experience, however he is now focusing on back end development in order to solidify the fundamentals needed to build robust/scalable AI. When he is not studying or coding, you can find him building PC's, walking dogs, or playing D&D.
